title: pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working
body:

replies.body: This issue may be caused by a setting with your OS or something else that's blocking the patcher from launching.  Running as administrator won't always solve this, as there may be other factors involved.  As a first step, I recommend using our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide which will provide a series of instructions to allow the patcher access.  Hope that helps!
it didn't work plz help us to solve this issue

Hey guys I have been struggling with this problem for a while now. I usually just update on my laptop and copy the files over. Today I tried something that worked for me. Navigate your way to Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS. In that folder there are rads_user_kernel.log files and a rads_user_kernel.txt file. I deleted them all and when I opened the launcher again, it was able to update properly.

I hope this works for you too.
